arm_group.arm_group_label: Clinic-based testing with standard referral for treatment
arm_group.description: Women will be offered HPV testing within the health facilities in the communities randomized to this arm.  Women who test HPV positive will be referred to care at the sub-district and district hospitals (current standard of care).

arm_group.arm_group_label: Community-based testing with standard linkage to care
arm_group.description: Women will be offered HPV-based cervical cancer screening followed by standard linkage to care for women who test positive (to subdistrict or district hospitals).

arm_group.arm_group_label: Community-based HPV testing with enhanced linkage to care
arm_group.description: Women will be offered HPV-based cervical cancer screening followed by enhanced linkage to care using the strategies determined in partnership with the key stakeholders in the communities.

brief_summary.textblock:
There are many challenges to implementation of cervical cancer prevention in
      resource-limited countries, despite evidence based screening and treatment strategies.  The
      investigators hypothesize that self-collected HPV specimens offered in a community health
      campaign setting will

clinical_study.brief_title: Community-Driven Cervical Cancer Prevention in Western Kenya
condition: Carcinoma in Situ of Uterine Cervix

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Female, ages 25-65 Willing to sign informed consent Lives in community where
             randomization arm is

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Prior hysterectomy

intervention.arm_group_label: Community-based testing with standard linkage to care
intervention.description: Women will be offered HPV-based cervical cancer screening followed by standard linkage to care for women who test positive (to subdistrict or district hospitals).
intervention.intervention_name: Community-based testing with standard linkage to care

intervention.arm_group_label: Community-based HPV testing with enhanced linkage to care
intervention.description: Women will be offered HPV-based cervical cancer screening followed by enhanced linkage to care using the strategies determined in partnership with the key stakeholders in the communities.
intervention.intervention_name: Community-based HPV testing with enhanced linkage to care

clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of a Community-Driven Cervical Cancer Prevention Strategy in Western Kenya

other_outcome.description: The investigators will determine the cost-effectiveness of the three strategies in this study: clinic-based testing with standard referral to care, community-health campaign testing w/ standard referral to care & community based testing w/ enhanced linkage to care.

primary_outcome.description: The investigators will compare the number of women who uptake HPV testing in the community health campaign arms compared to the number who uptake HPV testing in the clinic-based arms.
primary_outcome.measure: Reach of cervical cancer screening using self-collected HPV specimens in community health campaigns compared to clinics

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: The investigators will compare the number of women accessing treatment for positive HPV results with standard linkage to care compared to the enhanced linkage to treatment strategy.
secondary_outcome.measure: Determine the Efficacy of the cervical cancer prevention program

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Intervention Model: Factorial Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Health Services Research
